data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Hao-Miao, Cai, Qing-Hua (2014): Description of Chlorogomphus auripennis spec. nov. from Guangdong Province, with new records of Chlorogomphidae from Yunnan Province, China (Odonata: Chlorogomphidae). Zootaxa 3790 (3): 477-486, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3790.3.6
